com.ibm.webest.gui.utils
Class UnitConverter

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.webest.gui.utils.UnitConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.faces.convert.Converter
public class UnitConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.faces.convert.Converter

JSF converter to convert numeric values from one MeasuringUnit to another.

Author:
Gregor Schumm

getSourceUnit

public java.lang.String getSourceUnit()
Can be used as dynamic alternative to getSourceUnitInstance().

Returns:
the EL expression where the source unit can be retrieved from (expression has to evaluate to a MeasuringUnit instance)
